string.value: #p9270032# who is ossesed with fashion is looking for help once more. What should it be this time?

She is definately obssessed with fashion! She wants another dress. Wonder how many dresses she has in her closet. Is she a fashion model or something? Well, let's just give her what she needs.

#t4000035# #r#c4000035#/25#k
#t4000021# #r#c4000021#/25#k
#t4021003# #r#c4021003#/5
Angie rewarded with carrot cake to me to show her appreciation for gathering her the items for her new clothes. It looks so delicious.
You... yes! Stop looking around, it's you! Hmmm.. It's you again~ Since you have helped my once, how about helping me again? Alright hear me out.

This time, I saw another awesome dress from another shop around the corner of CBD. I asked the tailor, and he told me that it is a traditional Malay Costume . However, the dress isn't free you know? Sob~ I have used up the leather and tablecloth you given me on the first encounter. Will you help me again?
You sure you want to help me?! Gosh~ Thanks for the help once again!\nThis time round, I will need #b25 #t4000035#s, 25 #t4000021#s and 5 #t4021003#s#k for the dress!
I guess you don't know how to appreciate arts!
Where could I find extra leathers and tablecloths? Do you have any idea?
Woot! That's fast! I can't imagine seeing myself with the Malay Costume on me! How gorgeous can I be now~ Hohoho!
Ehh.... I don't think you have the materials I need for the dress. Please get me #b25 #t4000035#, 25 #t4000021# and 5 #t4021003##k!
